faces.title: Cute Penguin
faces.description: Bring holiday happiness to your wrist with this adorable penguin watch face. Wrapped in a cozy red scarf and Santa hat, it adds a warm, festive touch.

faces.title: Grinchy Christmas
faces.description: This Grinch inspired watch face blends bright ornaments, cozy wreaths, and playful stockings. It adds a fun mix of Christmas cheer with a cheeky twist, perfect for anyone who wants a little mischief on their wrist.

faces.title: Peekaboo Santa
faces.description: A cute Santa peeking over a bold red backdrop gives a fun surprise every time you check the time on your watch. Perfect for anyone who loves the joyful, whimsical side of Christmas.
